TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. IN Eucledian 4-space, you lose motor skills because you can't traverse W (the 4th axis after X, Y, and Z). In Spacetime, the universe keeps oscillating upon itself because you are traversing time.

I wish to bring back the 80's stars.

Granted, they're zombies.

I wish for my own Queen band, they sing for me and they are alive like they were in the 70's and 80's

granted they told you this "in this alphabetical time stamp it kinda mean that w is cerberus the 3 head dog guardian that protect the genome before x and y end in z before the next alpha cycle" knowing that make you instantly a dead immortals someday with unstoppable headache.

i wish for something else wich is exactly the same anyway as there no turning back in this process.

Edited July 21, 2015 by WinkAllKerb''

Granted. it's different.

I wish to be hair.

Granted, you get shaved off a head and never heard of again.

I wish I knew how to play basketball.

Granted. You now can play basketball on a slide whistle. (Honestly, I just googled "basketball song". It feels like there's a song for practically every word/phrase...)

I wish that there would actually be different songs for every phrase.

Edited July 21, 2015 by NeatCrown

Granted. The human race has so much information that it requires more electricity. A solar flare causes the earth to explode too.

I wish for raisins to stop existing, but still keep dried cranberries.

Granted. Grape wines do not exist, so the fancy drink is prune juice, which is not tasty.

I wish to meet Impact Blue.

Granted. They impact you out of the blue.

I wish for better feathers.

Granted - now there's no filling in your pillow.

I wish for a third ear.

Granted. It screws up your hearing

I wish for wings.

Granted, they gets sliced off in a kitchen accident.

I wish for sour patch kids.

Granted. They're really bitter.

I wish for a working eraser.

Granted, you erase the universe.

I wish for an Endurance!

Granted, however you fall into a black hole. The ship keeps you alive the whole time, letting you suffer from spaghettification.

I wish for a lag car.

Granted. A fleet of italian men in vespas trample your laggy car.

I wish for english to have french grammar.

Granted, but now we talk must this like.

I wish for this wish to not be corrupted.

Edited July 21, 2015 by LABHOUSE

granted, instead you die

I wish i had a YAL-4
Granted. It cracks your head open.

Um, okay, I'll just go back inside my lamp..

I wish for a doom fish skeleton.

Granted, that fish skeleton now constantly sings the "Doom doo-doom song".

I wishfully wish my wishes stopped become corrupted. Also a baked potato.

Granted, it's opposite day.

I wish for french fries.

Granted. The baked potato becomes grilled potato..

I wish to live with the next genie forever.

Granted, I turn psycho.

I wish for a roomate my age.
Granted. He's a pervert that's ferromagnetically attracted to you as in "the magnets you stick on your fridge" ferromagnets.
